goal.ch: 教育學生完整深入的保育知識與方法
goal.en: Educating student with knowledge and application of  Conservation Biology.

outline.ch:
1 .The Value of Biodiversity
2.Conservation in Theory
3.Conservation in Practice
4.Conservation Outside Protected Area
5 .Population structure and Molecular Systematics in Cetacean
6.Conservation of the Felidae
7 .Conservation in Canidae
8.Socioecology, Population Fragmentation, and Genetic loos in Primates
9 .Week of Midterm
10.Avise Conservation Genetics
11.Conservation Genetics of Marian Turtles
12.Conserving Evolutionary Process in Bovidae
13.Conservation Genetics in Fishes
14.Conservation Genetics of Endemic Plant Species
15.Wildlife harvesting
16.Ecosystem management and conservation
17.   Oral report
18.Week of Final
.
